name: Pixen Pattern
summary: Learn about .PXPATTERN files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Pixen allows users to design and save custom patterns as PXPATTERN files, which they can then reuse in other projects. For example, a pixel artist may create a repeating cobblestone pattern in Pixen and save it as a PXPATTERN file to quickly fill large areas of a game map. The artist then reuses the pattern across multiple scenes to keep the design consistent and speed up their workflow.
NOTE: To create a PXPATTERN file with the Pro version of Pixen, select Patterns, right-click the pattern, and select Export. The free version cannot export PXPATTERN files.

instructions: You can open PXPATTERN files with the Pro version of Furnace Creek Software Pixen in macOS. To open a PXPATTERN file, select Patterns, click the plus (+) icon in the lower-right, and select Import Pattern from 1-bit Image.
